name: hALP
description:
OH NU  😱

It looks like someone in hell messed up big time and got Danny the innocent doggo into hellish trouble. (Damn you evil Danny-cat!!!)

But luckily you can help Danny,  just get her to her well deserved angel wings before Danny's soul is lost forever, just don't run into one of those pesky lil' jumping-jack-demons.... 

you got this!

How to play with Danny:

WASD or arrow keys to lead Danny through the maze.
Optionally, you can use a controller.

Keep an eye on the time to make it out before the Gates of hell close FOREVER!!! (until till tomorrow morning, 9am)

You also have gods-mini-map which will give you a hint as to where you start, where you'll find Danny's wings  and where the demons are lurking around.  It's powers demand nothing less than your full attention, so you have to sit still to use it. ;)

Made with love <3 & no corona :

Programming and everything logical
Sebastian T. 

Arts & weirdness
Natascha R.

Spoopy songs made by this awesome royalty-free music supplier TeknoAXE.
